Posts.Content: RRG wrote: I finished A/C treatment and am 1/3 the way through radiation.  I will need to decide which Tax chemo next.  The onc has toned down the SE to me so as not to scare me, I think.  I have been reading info of SE that sound really yukky for the Taxotere.  My question is do the SE dissipate over time or between treatments, or am I to look forward to feeling really lousy for the entire 4 months?  What kind of SE have you experienced and would you recommend one Tax over the other? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Taxol v Taxotere? RRG Yogi70
